Item.Description:
Equipped with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology 2.02 3, your computer will have the unprecedented power and responsiveness to help your productivity soar. Smooth streaming for 4K premium content and HD entertainment enable immersive, full screen 4K and 360-degree experiences for incredibly vivid gaming and remarkable viewing. Plus, you will wield the power to create, edit, and share 4K and 360-degree content all with the lightning speed data transfers of Thunderbolt 3 technology. Its performance and versatility like never before.
System Specifications
(Please page down for detailed description)
CPU Intel Core i7-7700K Processor (8M Cache,up to 4.50 GHz) FC-LGA14C,BX80677I77700K

Card Readers All in 1 Memory Card Reader
Windows OS Not included
LCD Monitor Not included (LCD shown on the picture for decoration only, see details)
Warranty 3 years parts and labor limited warranty. Life time toll free telephone technical support.
Assembling All components are fully assembled and the system is tested with Windows OS before shipping.
Customize We provide you with a system configurater below; you may change the computer to your specifics. After you reconfigure the system you can list your own system to eBay and buy through eBay. During posting the new system it may take a short while please be patient. When receive your order we will review this customized computer to ensure all components are compatible, if any changes needed we will contact you to discuss and get your consent.
Shipping Out We ship out your computer within 3 days and we will email the tracking number to you.
Configurator
Please select the components you desire and click "Build my configuration".  A new Buy-it-now
eBay listing will post online and be ready for you to order.  

Terms & Contact
   

WARRANTY
We replace or repair the computer components for a period of 3 years from the original invoice date. If an replacement part is no longer available we reserves the right to substitute the component with an equivalent part, or offer an upgrade option.
We provide life time technical support by toll free line and email.

SHIPPING
We typically ship out a computer within 3 business days when payment received. We ship by UPS and delivery takes 1-7 days.  Tracking number is emailed to you and posted on your eBay account. We charge additional $40 for HI, PR, AK, NWT, etc. We ship to APO/FPO. 

RETURN POLICY
Return is accepted within 30 days of delivery. We may assess a 15% of restocking fee. Buyer is responsible for returning. Software and shipping fees are not refundable.
 
  Please call:

1416.446.7743

System Details
About Me
   

ABOUT ME
LU Computers is an established company providing computers and parts to home users and businesses in the US and Canada.  Based in Toronto and New York, we aim at delivering fast and courteous service to our customers.

With our hard working, dedication and efficient operation, our sales volume has been increasing tremendously year after year, which permits us to establish ties with manufacturers and negotiate prices with vendors. This price benefit is passed right on to you, our customers.

Our technical team is made of professional enthusiasts who are on the cutting edge of computing, and bring you the latest technology and stay tuned to what is the hot.  Being a dedicated computer builder since 1993, our accumulated knowledge enables us to deliver effective and prompt technical support.

LU Computers only stocks brand new and top quality name brand products. When you receive your dream PC, high-end or just "bare-bone", it is fully assembled, tested and well packed in our manufactory facility with 100-feet state-of-art computer assembly line. We stock adequate items to ensure prompt shipment.

LU Computers provides toll free lifetime support in addition to our standard warranty. We stand behind the products we sell, and if a problem arises after delivery we will take the necessary action to ensure the matter is resolved. We will do this fairly and professionally.
